mapper.sql: RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, RQST_DTL_SNO, PDM_COL_ID, PDM_COL_PNM, PDM_COL_LNM, BF_PDM_COL_PNM, RQST_DCD, VRF_CD, VRF_RMK, PDM_TBL_ID, PDM_TBL_PNM, MDL_LNM, UPP_SUBJ_LNM, SUBJ_ID, SUBJ_LNM, SDITM_ID, COL_ORD, DATA_TYPE, DATA_LEN, DATA_SCAL, PK_YN, PK_ORD, NONUL_YN, DEFLT_VAL, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID, ENC_YN

A.RQST_NO, A.RQST_SNO, A.RQST_DTL_SNO, A.PDM_COL_ID, A.PDM_COL_PNM, A.PDM_COL_LNM, A.BF_PDM_COL_PNM, A.RQST_DCD, A.VRF_CD, A.VRF_RMK, A.PDM_TBL_ID, A.PDM_TBL_PNM, A.MDL_LNM, A.UPP_SUBJ_LNM, A.SUBJ_ID, A.SUBJ_LNM, A.SDITM_ID, A.COL_ORD, A.DATA_TYPE, A.DATA_LEN, A.DATA_SCAL , CASE WHEN A.PK_YN IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE A.PK_YN END AS PK_YN, A.PK_ORD , CASE WHEN A.NONUL_YN IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE A.NONUL_YN END AS NONUL_YN, A.DEFLT_VAL, A.OBJ_DESCN, A.OBJ_VERS, A.REG_TYP_CD, A.FRS_RQST_DTM, A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, A.RQST_DTM, A.RQST_USER_ID, A.APRV_DTM, A.APRV_USER_ID, B.FULL_PATH

RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, RQST_DTL_SNO, PDM_COL_ID, PDM_COL_PNM, PDM_COL_LNM, BF_PDM_COL_PNM, RQST_DCD, VRF_CD, VRF_RMK, PDM_TBL_ID, PDM_TBL_PNM, MDL_LNM, UPP_SUBJ_LNM, SUBJ_ID, SUBJ_LNM, SDITM_ID, COL_ORD, DATA_TYPE, DATA_LEN, DATA_SCAL, PK_YN, PK_ORD, NONUL_YN, DEFLT_VAL, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID
mapper.insert: insert /* WaqPdmColMapper.insert */ into WAQ_PDM_COL (RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, RQST_DTL_SNO, PDM_COL_ID, PDM_COL_PNM, PDM_COL_LNM, BF_PDM_COL_PNM, RQST_DCD, VRF_CD, VRF_RMK, PDM_TBL_ID, PDM_TBL_PNM, MDL_LNM, UPP_SUBJ_LNM, SUBJ_ID, SUBJ_LNM, SDITM_ID, COL_ORD, DATA_TYPE, DATA_LEN, DATA_SCAL, PK_YN, PK_ORD, NONUL_YN, DEFLT_VAL, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID) values (#{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rqstDtlSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{pdmColId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pdmColPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pdmColLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bfPdmColPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pdmTblId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pdmTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mdlLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uppSubjLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subjLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sditmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{colOrd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataLen,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dataScal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{pkYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pkOrd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{nonulYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{defltVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

SELECT /* WaqPdmColMapper.insertSelective */ IFNULL(MAX(RQST_DTL_SNO), 0) + 1 FROM WAQ_PDM_COL WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

OBJ_DESCN,
OBJ_VERS,
REG_TYP_CD,
FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM,
RQST_USER_ID,
ENC_YN,

INSERT /* WaqPdmColMapper.insertByRqstSno */ INTO WAQ_PDM_COL( RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, RQST_DTL_SNO, PDM_COL_ID, PDM_COL_PNM, PDM_COL_LNM, RQST_DCD , PDM_TBL_ID, PDM_TBL_PNM, SUBJ_ID, SDITM_ID, COL_ORD, DATA_TYPE, DATA_LEN, DATA_SCAL, PK_YN, PK_ORD, NONUL_YN, DEFLT_VAL , OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, ENC_YN ) SELECT B.RQST_NO, B.RQST_SNO , (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(RQST_DTL_SNO), 0) FROM WAQ_PDM_COL WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno} ) + @rownum:=@rownum+1 AS RQST_DTL_SNO , C.PDM_COL_ID, C.PDM_COL_PNM, C.PDM_COL_LNM, 'CU' AS RQST_DCD , C.PDM_TBL_ID , A.PDM_TBL_PNM , A.SUBJ_ID , C.SDITM_ID , C.COL_ORD , C.DATA_TYPE , C.DATA_LEN , C.DATA_SCAL , IFNULL(C.PK_YN,'N') , C.PK_ORD , IFNULL(C.NONUL_YN,'N') , C.DEFLT_VAL , C.OBJ_DESCN , C.OBJ_VERS, B.FRS_RQST_DTM, B.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, NOW(), B.RQST_USER_ID, C.ENC_YN FROM (SELECT @rownum:=0) TMP,WAM_PDM_TBL A INNER JOIN WAQ_PDM_TBL B ON A.PDM_TBL_ID = B.PDM_TBL_ID INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_COL C ON A.PDM_TBL_ID = C.PDM_TBL_ID WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno}
mapper.update:
update /* WaqPdmColMapper.updateByPrimaryKeySelective */ WAQ_PDM_COL
PDM_COL_ID = #{pdmColId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PDM_COL_PNM = #{pdmColPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PDM_COL_LNM = #{pdmColLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BF_PDM_COL_PNM = #{bfPdmColPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DCD = #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_CD = #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_RMK = #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PDM_TBL_ID = #{pdmTblId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PDM_TBL_PNM = #{pdmTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MDL_LNM = #{mdlLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPP_SUBJ_LNM = #{uppSubjLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUBJ_ID = #{subjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUBJ_LNM = #{subjLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SDITM_ID = #{sditmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COL_ORD = #{colOrd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DATA_TYPE = #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATA_LEN = #{dataLen,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DATA_SCAL = #{dataScal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PK_YN = #{pkYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PK_ORD = #{pkOrd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NONUL_YN = #{nonulYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEFLT_VAL = #{defltVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DTM = NOW() ,
RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENC_YN = #{encYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and RQST_DTL_SNO = #{rqstDtlSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update /* WaqPdmColMapper.updateByPrimaryKey */ WAQ_PDM_COL set PDM_COL_ID = #{pdmColId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PDM_COL_PNM = #{pdmColPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PDM_COL_LNM = #{pdmColLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BF_PDM_COL_PNM = #{bfPdmColPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DCD = #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VRF_CD = #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VRF_RMK = #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PDM_TBL_ID = #{pdmTblId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PDM_TBL_PNM = #{pdmTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MDL_LNM = #{mdlLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPP_SUBJ_LNM = #{uppSubjLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUBJ_ID = #{subjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUBJ_LNM = #{subjLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SDITM_ID = #{sditmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COL_ORD = #{colOrd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DATA_TYPE = #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATA_LEN = #{dataLen,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DATA_SCAL = #{dataScal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PK_YN = #{pkYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PK_ORD = #{pkOrd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NONUL_YN = #{nonulYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEFLT_VAL = #{defltVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and RQST_DTL_SNO = #{rqstDtlSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

UPDATE /* WaqPdmColMapper.updateRqstDcdbyTable */ WAQ_PDM_COL A SET A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_PDM_TBL B WHERE B.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND B.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO AND B.RQST_DCD = 'DD' )

UPDATE /* WaqPdmColMapper.updateCheckInit */ WAQ_PDM_COL A LEFT JOIN WAQ_PDM_TBL B ON B.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND B.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO AND B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_PDM_TBL C ON C.FULL_PATH = B.FULL_PATH AND C.PDM_TBL_PNM = B.PDM_TBL_PNM LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_PDM_COL D ON D.PDM_TBL_ID = C.PDM_TBL_ID AND D.PDM_COL_PNM = A.PDM_COL_PNM SET A.REG_TYP_CD = CASE WHEN A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' THEN 'D' ELSE CASE WHEN D.PDM_COL_ID IS NULL THEN 'C' ELSE 'U' END END , A.PDM_COL_ID = D.PDM_COL_ID , A.VRF_CD = '4' , A.SDITM_ID = NULL WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

UPDATE /* WaqPdmColMapper.updateTblPnmbyRqstSno */ WAQ_PDM_COL A SET PDM_TBL_PNM = ( SELECT MAX(PDM_TBL_PNM) FROM WAQ_PDM_TBL B WHERE B.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND B.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO )
WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.PDM_TBL_PNM IS NULL

UPDATE /* WaqPdmColMapper.updateObjEnm */ WAQ_PDM_COL A INNER JOIN WAM_SDITM B ON B.SDITM_LNM = REGEXP_REPLACE(A.PDM_COL_LNM,CONCAT('[',CONVERT(CHAR(63) using utf8),'0-9]+$'),'') LEFT JOIN WAA_INFO_TYPE C ON B.INFOTP_ID = C.INFOTP_ID AND C.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') SET A.SDITM_ID = B.SDITM_ID , A.DATA_TYPE = IFNULL(B.DATA_TYPE,C.DATA_TYPE) , A.DATA_LEN = IFNULL(B.DATA_LEN,C.DATA_LEN) , A.DATA_SCAL = IFNULL(B.DATA_SCAL,C.DATA_SCAL) WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} -- AND A.SDITM_ID IS NULL AND A.DATA_TYPE IS NULL AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_PDM_TBL D WHERE D.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND D.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO -- AND D.STD_APL_YN = 'Y' )

UPDATE /* WaqPdmColMapper.updateStndDateType */ WAQ_PDM_COL A INNER JOIN V_CHECK_SDITM B
ON B.SDITM_LNM = REGEXP_REPLACE(A.PDM_COL_LNM,CONCAT('[',CONVERT(CHAR(63) using utf8),'0-9]+$'),'') AND B.STND_ASRT = #{stndAsrt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B.DBMS_TYPE = #{dbmsTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} SET A.DATA_TYPE = B.DATA_TYPE , A.DATA_LEN = B.DATA_LEN , A.DATA_SCAL = B.DATA_SCAL WHERE IFNULL(A.RQST_NO,'') = #{rqstNo} AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND IFNULL(A.SDITM_ID,'') != '' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM V_CHECK_SDITM B WHERE B.SDITM_LNM = REGEXP_REPLACE(A.PDM_COL_LNM,CONCAT('[',CONVERT(CHAR(63) using utf8),'0-9]+$'),'') AND B.STND_ASRT = #{stndAsrt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B.DBMS_TYPE = #{dbmsTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_PDM_TBL D WHERE D.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND D.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO AND D.STD_APL_YN = 'Y' )

UPDATE /* WaqPdmColMapper.updatePdmColPnm */ WAQ_PDM_COL A SET A.PDM_COL_PNM = ( SELECT CONCAT(B.SDITM_PNM , SUBSTR(A.PDM_COL_LNM, LENGTH(REGEXP_REPLACE(A.PDM_COL_LNM,CONCAT('[',CONVERT(CHAR(63) using utf8),'0-9]+$'),''))+1, LENGTH(A.PDM_COL_LNM))) FROM WAM_SDITM B WHERE B.SDITM_LNM = REGEXP_REPLACE(A.PDM_COL_LNM,CONCAT('[',CONVERT(CHAR(63) using utf8),'0-9]+$'),'') AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') ) WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_PDM_TBL D WHERE D.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND D.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO AND D.STD_APL_YN = 'Y' ) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_SDITM B WHERE B.SDITM_LNM = REGEXP_REPLACE(A.PDM_COL_LNM,CONCAT('[',CONVERT(CHAR(63) using utf8),'0-9]+$'),'') AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U')
)

UPDATE /* WaqPdmColMapper.updateSditm */ WAQ_PDM_COL A LEFT JOIN WAQ_PDM_TBL B ON A.RQST_NO = B.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = B.RQST_SNO LEFT JOIN WAM_SDITM C ON C.SDITM_LNM = REGEXP_REPLACE(A.PDM_COL_LNM,CONCAT('[',CONVERT(CHAR(63) using utf8),'0-9]+$'),'') AND C.STND_ASRT = B.STND_ASRT
SET A.SDITM_ID = C.SDITM_ID , A.ENC_YN = C.ENC_YN
WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.SDITM_ID IS NULL AND 'Y' = (SELECT IFNULL(STD_APL_YN,'N') FROM WAQ_PDM_TBL Z WHERE Z.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.RQST_SNO = Z.RQST_SNO )
UPDATE /* WaqPdmColMapper.updatePkOrd */ WAQ_PDM_COL X SET X.PK_ORD = X.COL_ORD WHERE X.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND X.PK_YN = 'Y' AND X.PK_ORD IS NULL
mapper.insert:
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_PDM_COL D WHERE A.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = D.RQST_SNO
AND A.PDM_COL_PNM = D.PDM_COL_PNM AND A.RQST_DTL_SNO != D.RQST_DTL_SNO)

AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_MSTR E INNER JOIN WAQ_PDM_TBL D ON E.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO AND E.RQST_NO != #{rqstNo} AND E.RQST_STEP_CD = 'Q' AND IFNULL(D.RVW_STS_CD, 0) != '2' INNER JOIN WAQ_PDM_TBL F ON F.PDM_TBL_PNM = D.PDM_TBL_PNM
AND F.FULL_PATH = D.FULL_PATH WHERE F.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND F.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO )
AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND LENGTH(A.PDM_COL_PNM) > 30
AND ( A.DATA_TYPE IS NULL OR A.DATA_TYPE = '' )

AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_PDM_COL D WHERE A.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = D.RQST_SNO AND A.PDM_COL_LNM != D.PDM_COL_LNM AND A.PDM_COL_PNM = D.PDM_COL_PNM AND A.RQST_DTL_SNO != D.RQST_DTL_SNO)
AND A.PDM_COL_PNM IS NULL

AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_PDM_COL D WHERE A.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = D.RQST_SNO AND A.PDM_COL_LNM = D.PDM_COL_LNM AND A.PDM_COL_PNM != D.PDM_COL_PNM AND A.RQST_DTL_SNO != D.RQST_DTL_SNO AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') )
AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.SDITM_ID IS NULL AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_PDM_TBL D WHERE D.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND D.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO AND D.STD_APL_YN = 'Y' )

AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND IFNULL(A.SDITM_ID,'') != '' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM V_CHECK_SDITM X INNER JOIN WAQ_PDM_TBL Y ON Y.STND_ASRT = X.STND_ASRT AND Y.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE Y.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND Y.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO AND X.DBMS_TYPE = #{dbmsTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND X.STND_ASRT = #{stndAsrt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND IFNULL(X.SDITM_LNM,'') = REGEXP_REPLACE(A.PDM_COL_LNM,CONCAT('[',CONVERT(CHAR(63) using utf8),'0-9]+$'),'') AND X.DATA_TYPE = A.DATA_TYPE AND IFNULL(X.DATA_LEN,0) = IFNULL(A.DATA_LEN,0) AND IFNULL(X.DATA_SCAL,0) = IFNULL(A.DATA_SCAL,0) ) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_PDM_TBL D WHERE D.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND D.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO AND D.STD_APL_YN = 'Y' )
AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.PK_YN = 'Y' AND A.NONUL_YN != 'Y'

AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_PDM_COL D WHERE A.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = D.RQST_SNO AND A.COL_ORD = D.COL_ORD AND D.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.RQST_DTL_SNO != D.RQST_DTL_SNO)

AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.PK_YN = 'Y' AND A.PK_ORD IS NOT NULL AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_PDM_COL D WHERE A.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = D.RQST_SNO AND A.PK_ORD = D.PK_ORD AND D.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.RQST_DTL_SNO != D.RQST_DTL_SNO)
AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.PK_YN = 'Y' AND A.PK_ORD IS NULL AND A.NONUL_YN IS NULL
AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.COL_ORD IS NULL

AND A.REG_TYP_CD = 'U' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_PDM_TBL D JOIN WAM_PDM_COL E ON D.PDM_TBL_ID = E.PDM_TBL_ID JOIN WAQ_PDM_TBL F ON F.FULL_PATH = D.FULL_PATH AND F.PDM_TBL_PNM = D.PDM_TBL_PNM WHERE F.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND F.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO AND A.PDM_COL_PNM = E.PDM_COL_PNM AND IFNULL(A.PDM_COL_LNM, '') = IFNULL(E.PDM_COL_LNM, '') AND IFNULL(A.COL_ORD, 0) = IFNULL(E.COL_ORD, 0) AND IFNULL(A.DATA_TYPE, '') = IFNULL(E.DATA_TYPE, '') AND IFNULL(A.DATA_LEN, 0) = IFNULL(E.DATA_LEN, 0) AND IFNULL(A.DATA_SCAL, 0) = IFNULL(E.DATA_SCAL, 0) AND IFNULL(A.PK_YN, 'N') = IFNULL(E.PK_YN, 'N') AND IFNULL(A.PK_ORD, 0) = IFNULL(E.PK_ORD, 0) AND IFNULL(A.NONUL_YN, 'N') = IFNULL(E.NONUL_YN, 'N') AND IFNULL(A.DEFLT_VAL, '') = IFNULL(E.DEFLT_VAL, '') AND IFNULL(A.OBJ_DESCN, '') = IFNULL(E.OBJ_DESCN, '') -- and IFNULL(A.ENC_YN, 'N') = IFNULL(E.ENC_YN, 'N') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_RQST_VRF_DTLS V WHERE V.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND V.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO AND V.RQST_DTL_SNO = A.RQST_DTL_SNO ) )

AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.DATA_TYPE LIKE '%NUMBER%'
AND IFNULL(NONUL_YN,'N') ='N' AND IFNULL(A.DEFLT_VAL,-1) !=0 AND A.PDM_COL_PNM NOT LIKE '%#_SRNO' ESCAPE '#' AND A.PDM_COL_PNM NOT LIKE '%#_NO' ESCAPE '#' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_PDM_TBL Z WHERE A.RQST_NO = Z.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = Z.RQST_SNO AND Z.STD_APL_YN ='Y')
AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.PDM_COL_PNM IN ('SYS_REG_DTM','SYS_RGSR_EMNO','SYS_REG_BRCD','SYS_CHG_DTM','SYS_EDIR_EMNO','SYS_CHG_BRCD' ) AND A.NONUL_YN = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE /* WaqPdmColMapper.updateNotvChgData */ WAQ_PDM_COL A SET A.VRF_CD = '5' WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.REG_TYP_CD = 'U' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_PDM_TBL D INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_COL E ON D.PDM_TBL_ID = E.PDM_TBL_ID INNER JOIN WAQ_PDM_TBL F ON F.FULL_PATH = D.FULL_PATH AND F.PDM_TBL_PNM = D.PDM_TBL_PNM WHERE F.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND F.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO AND A.PDM_COL_PNM = E.PDM_COL_PNM AND IFNULL(A.PDM_COL_LNM, '_') = IFNULL(E.PDM_COL_LNM , '_') AND IFNULL(A.COL_ORD , 0) = IFNULL(E.COL_ORD , 0) AND IFNULL(A.DATA_TYPE , '_') = IFNULL(E.DATA_TYPE , '_') AND IFNULL(A.DATA_LEN , 0) = IFNULL(E.DATA_LEN , 0) AND IFNULL(A.DATA_SCAL , 0) = IFNULL(E.DATA_SCAL , 0) AND IFNULL(A.PK_YN , '_') = IFNULL(E.PK_YN , '_') AND IFNULL(A.PK_ORD , 0) = IFNULL(E.PK_ORD , 0) AND IFNULL(A.NONUL_YN , '_') = IFNULL(E.NONUL_YN , '_') AND IFNULL(A.DEFLT_VAL , '_') = IFNULL(E.DEFLT_VAL , '_') AND IFNULL(A.OBJ_DESCN , '_') = IFNULL(E.OBJ_DESCN , '_') )
mapper.sql: A.PDM_COL_PNM, A.PDM_COL_LNM, A.PDM_TBL_ID, A.SDITM_ID, A.COL_ORD, A.DATA_TYPE, A.DATA_LEN , A.DATA_SCAL, A.PK_YN, A.PK_ORD, A.NONUL_YN, A.DEFLT_VAL, A.RQST_NO, A.RQST_SNO, A.RQST_DTL_SNO, A.OBJ_DESCN , A.OBJ_VERS, A.REG_TYP_CD, A.FRS_RQST_DTM, A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, A.RQST_DTM, A.RQST_USER_ID, A.APRV_DTM, A.APRV_USER_ID , A.ENC_YN

PDM_COL_PNM, PDM_COL_LNM, PDM_TBL_ID, SDITM_ID, COL_ORD, DATA_TYPE, DATA_LEN , DATA_SCAL, PK_YN, PK_ORD, NONUL_YN, DEFLT_VAL, RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, RQST_DTL_SNO, OBJ_DESCN , OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID , ENC_YN
mapper.select: SELECT /* WaqPdmColMapper.selectWaqC */ B.* FROM WAQ_PDM_TBL A INNER JOIN WAQ_PDM_COL B ON A.RQST_NO = B.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = B.RQST_SNO WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND B.REG_TYP_CD = 'C' AND B.VRF_CD = '1'
mapper.update:
UPDATE /* WaqPdmColMapper.updateWaqCUD */ WAQ_PDM_COL A INNER JOIN WAQ_PDM_TBL B ON A.RQST_NO = B.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = B.RQST_SNO AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_COL D ON B.PDM_TBL_ID = D.PDM_TBL_ID AND A.PDM_COL_PNM = D.PDM_COL_PNM
SET A.PDM_COL_ID = D.PDM_COL_ID , A.PDM_TBL_ID = B.PDM_TBL_ID , A.OBJ_VERS = IFNULL(D.OBJ_VERS, 0) + 1 , A.FRS_RQST_DTM = D.FRS_RQST_DTM , A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID = D.FRS_RQST_USER_ID
WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.VRF_CD = '1' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_PDM_TBL B INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_COL D ON B.PDM_TBL_ID = D.PDM_TBL_ID WHERE B.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND B.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO AND D.PDM_COL_PNM = A.PDM_COL_PNM AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' )

UPDATE /* WaqPdmColMapper.updateWaqId */ WAQ_PDM_COL A INNER JOIN WAQ_PDM_TBL B ON A.RQST_NO = B.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = B.RQST_SNO AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1'
SET A.SUBJ_ID = B.SUBJ_ID , A.PDM_TBL_ID = B.PDM_TBL_ID , A.APRV_DTM = NOW() , A.APRV_USER_ID = B.APRV_USER_ID WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.VRF_CD = '1'
mapper.delete: DELETE /* WaqPdmColMapper.deleteWAM */ A FROM WAM_PDM_COL A INNER JOIN WAQ_PDM_COL C ON C.PDM_COL_ID = A.PDM_COL_ID AND C.PDM_COL_PNM = A.PDM_COL_PNM INNER JOIN WAQ_PDM_TBL B ON B.RQST_NO = C.RQST_NO AND B.RQST_SNO = C.RQST_SNO AND B.PDM_TBL_ID = A.PDM_TBL_ID WHERE C.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND C.VRF_CD = '1'
mapper.insert: INSERT /* WaqPdmColMapper.insertWAM */ INTO WAM_PDM_COL ( PDM_COL_ID , ) SELECT A.PDM_COL_ID , FROM WAQ_PDM_COL A INNER JOIN WAQ_PDM_TBL B ON A.RQST_NO = B.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = B.RQST_SNO WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.VRF_CD = '1' AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1'
mapper.update: UPDATE /* WaqPdmColMapper.updateWAH */ WAH_PDM_COL A INNER JOIN WAQ_PDM_COL C ON C.PDM_TBL_ID = A.PDM_TBL_ID AND C.PDM_COL_ID = A.PDM_COL_ID INNER JOIN WAQ_PDM_TBL B ON B.RQST_NO = C.RQST_NO AND B.RQST_SNO = C.RQST_SNO SET A.EXP_DTM = NOW() WHERE A.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND C.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND C.VRF_CD = '1' AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1'
mapper.insert: INSERT /* WaqPdmColMapper.insertWAH */ INTO WAH_PDM_COL ( PDM_COL_ID , EXP_DTM , STR_DTM , ) SELECT A.PDM_COL_ID , STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AS EXP_DTM , NOW() AS STR_DTM , FROM WAQ_PDM_COL A INNER JOIN WAQ_PDM_TBL B ON B.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND B.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.VRF_CD = '1' AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1'

INSERT /* WaqPdmColMapper.insertByRqstMartCol */ INTO WAQ_PDM_COL( RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, RQST_DTL_SNO, PDM_COL_ID, PDM_COL_PNM, PDM_COL_LNM, RQST_DCD , PDM_TBL_ID, PDM_TBL_PNM, SUBJ_ID, SDITM_ID, COL_ORD, DATA_TYPE, DATA_LEN, DATA_SCAL, PK_YN, PK_ORD, NONUL_YN, DEFLT_VAL , OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID )
SELECT DISTINCT SE.RQST_NO, RQST_SNO
, (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(RQST_DTL_SNO), 0) FROM WAQ_PDM_COL WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno} ) + @rownum:=@rownum+1 AS RQST_DTL_SNO ,'' AS PDM_COL_ID ,MMART7.WISE_M7_INFO.GET_COLUMN_NAME(J.OBJECTID) AS PDM_COL_PNM ,MMART7.WISE_M7_INFO.GET_ATTRIBUTE_NAME(J.OBJECTID) ASPDM_COL_LNM ,'CU' AS RQST_DCD ,'' AS PDM_TBL_ID ,TRIM(IFNULL(I.STRINGVALUE, H.STRINGVALUE)) AS PDM_TBL_PNM ,'' AS SUBJ_ID ,'' AS SDITM_ID ,K.SEQUENCENUMBER + 1 AS COL_ORD ,UPPER(MMART7.WISE_M7_INFO.GET_LOGICAL_DATATYPE(J.OBJECTID)) AS DATA_TYPE ,MMART7.WISE_M7_INFO.GET_LOGICAL_DATALENGTH(J.OBJECTID) AS DATA_LENGTH ,'' AS DATA_SCALE ,'' AS IS_PK_YN ,CASE WHEN MMART7.WISE_M7_INFO.GET_KEY_TYPE('PK', J.OBJECTID) = 'Y' THEN K.SEQUENCENUMBER + 1 END AS PK_POSITION ,CASE WHEN IFNULL(UPPER(MMART7.WISE_M7_INFO.GET_NULL(J.OBJECTID)),'NULL') = 'NULL' THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS NOT_NULL_YN ,MMART7.WISE_M7_INFO.GET_DEFAULT_VALUE(J.OBJECTID) AS DATA_DEFAULT ,CASE WHEN MMART7.WISE_M7_INFO.GET_ATTR_DEFINITION_CNT(J.OBJECTID) > 0 THEN MMART7.WISE_M7_INFO.get_attribute_definition(J.OBJECTID) ELSE M.STRINGVALUE END AS DESCRIPTION ,SE.OBJ_VERS AS OBJ_VERS ,SE.FRS_RQST_DTM , SE.FRS_RQST_USER_ID , NOW() , SE.RQST_USER_ID FROM (SELECT @rownum:=0) TMP , MMART7.M7LIBRARY A , MMART7.M7OBJECT B , MMART7.M7OBJECT C , MMART7.M7LIBRARY D , MMART7.M7OBJECT E , MMART7.M7LIBRARY F , MMART7.M7OBJECTPROPERTY G , MMART7.M7OBJECTPROPERTY H , MMART7.M7OBJECTPROPERTY I , MMART7.M7OBJECT J , MMART7.M7OBJECTPROPERTY K , MMART7.M7OBJECTPROPERTY L , MMART7.M7OBJECTPROPERTY M , WAQ_PDM_TBL SE WHERE A.OBJECTID = B.OBJECTID AND B.CLASSID = 2 AND B.ENDVERSION IS NULL AND A.OBJECTID = C.CONTAINERID AND C.CLASSID = 1075838978 AND C.ENDVERSION IS NULL AND C.OBJECTID = D.OBJECTID AND D.OBJECTID = E.CONTAINERID AND E.CLASSID = 1075839014 AND E.ENDVERSION IS NULL AND E.OBJECTID = F.OBJECTID AND F.OBJECTID = G.OBJECTID AND G.PROPERTYID = 1075849443 AND G.VALUEOBJECTID = H.OBJECTID AND H.PROPERTYID = 1073742126 AND H.OBJECTID = I.OBJECTID(+) AND I.PROPERTYID(+) = 1075849176 AND H.OBJECTID = J.CONTEXTID AND J.CLASSID||'' = 1075838981 AND J.ENDVERSION IS NULL AND J.OBJECTID = K.VALUEOBJECTID AND K.OBJECTID = H.OBJECTID AND K.PROPERTYID = 1075850197 AND J.OBJECTID = L.OBJECTID(+) AND L.PROPERTYID(+) = 1075849062 AND J.OBJECTID = M.OBJECTID(+) AND M.PROPERTYID(+) = 1073742125 AND F.OBJECTNAME != '<Main Subject Area>'
AND SE.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND SE.RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno}
AND IFNULL(H.STRINGVALUE, I.STRINGVALUE) = SE.PDM_TBL_LNM AND MMART7.WISE_M7_INFO.GET_LOGICALONLY(J.OBJECTID) = 0
ORDER BY PDM_TBL_PNM, COL_ORD

INSERT /* WaqPdmColMapper.insertWaqColRejected */ INTO WAQ_PDM_COL( ,RQST_NO ,RQST_SNO ,RQST_DTL_SNO ,PDM_COL_ID ,PDM_COL_PNM ,PDM_COL_LNM ,BF_PDM_COL_PNM ,RQST_DCD ,VRF_CD ,VRF_RMK ,PDM_TBL_ID ,PDM_TBL_PNM ,MDL_LNM ,UPP_SUBJ_LNM ,SUBJ_ID ,SUBJ_LNM ,SDITM_ID ,COL_ORD ,DATA_TYPE ,DATA_LEN ,DATA_SCAL ,PK_YN ,PK_ORD ,NONUL_YN ,DEFLT_VAL ,OBJ_DESCN ,OBJ_VERS ,REG_TYP_CD ,FRS_RQST_DTM ,FRS_RQST_USER_ID ,RQST_DTM ,RQST_USER_ID ,APRV_DTM ,APRV_USER_ID ,ENC_YN ) SELECT #{reqmst.rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,A.RQST_SNO ,A.RQST_DTL_SNO ,A.PDM_COL_ID ,A.PDM_COL_PNM ,A.PDM_COL_LNM ,A.BF_PDM_COL_PNM ,A.RQST_DCD ,NULL ,NULL ,A.PDM_TBL_ID ,A.PDM_TBL_PNM ,A.MDL_LNM ,A.UPP_SUBJ_LNM ,A.SUBJ_ID ,A.SUBJ_LNM ,A.SDITM_ID ,A.COL_ORD ,A.DATA_TYPE ,A.DATA_LEN ,A.DATA_SCAL ,A.PK_YN ,A.PK_ORD ,A.NONUL_YN ,A.DEFLT_VAL ,A.OBJ_DESCN ,A.OBJ_VERS ,A.REG_TYP_CD ,A.FRS_RQST_DTM ,A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID ,A.RQST_DTM ,A.RQST_USER_ID ,NULL ,NULL ,A.ENC_YN FROM WAQ_PDM_COL A INNER JOIN WAQ_PDM_TBL B ON A.PDM_TBL_PNM =B.PDM_TBL_PNM AND A.RQST_NO = B.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = B.RQST_SNO WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{oldRqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '2'

INSERT /* WaqPdmColMapper.insertnoWaqdelCol */ INTO WAQ_PDM_COL ( RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, RQST_DTL_SNO , PDM_COL_ID , PDM_COL_PNM , PDM_COL_LNM , BF_PDM_COL_PNM , RQST_DCD, VRF_CD , VRF_RMK, PDM_TBL_ID, PDM_TBL_PNM , MDL_LNM, UPP_SUBJ_LNM, SUBJ_ID , SUBJ_LNM, SDITM_ID, COL_ORD , DATA_TYPE, DATA_LEN, DATA_SCAL , PK_YN, PK_ORD, NONUL_YN , DEFLT_VAL, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS , REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID , RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID ) SELECT C.RQST_NO , C.RQST_SNO , IFNULL((SELECT MAX(E.RQST_DTL_SNO) FROM WAQ_PDM_COL E WHERE E.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND E.RQST_SNO = C.RQST_SNO ),0)+@rownum:=@rownum+1 AS RQST_DTL_SNO , B.PDM_COL_ID , B.PDM_COL_PNM , B.PDM_COL_LNM , NULL , 'DD', 1, NULL, B. PDM_TBL_ID, C.PDM_TBL_PNM , C.MDL_LNM, C.UPP_SUBJ_LNM, C.SUBJ_ID , C.SUBJ_LNM, B.SDITM_ID, B.COL_ORD , B.DATA_TYPE, B.DATA_LEN, B.DATA_SCAL , B.PK_YN, B.PK_ORD, B.NONUL_YN , B.DEFLT_VAL, B.OBJ_DESCN, B.OBJ_VERS+1 , 'D' , C.FRS_RQST_DTM, C.FRS_RQST_USER_ID , C.RQST_DTM, C.RQST_USER_ID FROM (SELECT @rownum:=0) TMP,WAM_PDM_TBL A INNER JOIN WAQ_PDM_TBL C ON A.PDM_TBL_PNM = C.PDM_TBL_PNM AND A.FULL_PATH = C.FULL_PATH INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_COL B ON A.PDM_TBL_ID = B.PDM_TBL_ID LEFT JOIN WAQ_PDM_COL D ON C.PDM_TBL_PNM = D.PDM_TBL_PNM AND C.RQST_NO =D.RQST_NO AND C.RQST_SNO = D.RQST_SNO AND B.PDM_COL_PNM = D.PDM_COL_PNM WHERE C.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND D.PDM_COL_PNM IS NULL
mapper.update: UPDATE /* WaqPdmColMapper.updateEncYnisNull */ WAQ_PDM_COL A SET A.ENC_YN = 'N' WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.ENC_YN IS NULL
mapper.insert: AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_MST_TBL_MAP Z WHERE Z.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND Z.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231', '%Y%m%d') AND Z.HIST_DDL_TBL_PNM = A.PDM_TBL_PNM AND A.PK_YN != 'Y' AND A.PDM_COL_PNM NOT IN (SELECT Q.PDM_COL_PNM FROM WAQ_PDM_COL Q WHERE Q.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND Q.PDM_TBL_PNM = Z.MST_DDL_TBL_PNM ) )

AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_MST_TBL_MAP Z WHERE Z.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND Z.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231', '%Y%m%d') AND Z.MST_DDL_TBL_PNM = A.PDM_TBL_PNM AND A.PK_YN != 'Y' AND A.PDM_COL_PNM NOT IN (SELECT Q.PDM_COL_PNM FROM WAQ_PDM_COL Q WHERE Q.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND Q.PDM_TBL_PNM = Z.HIST_DDL_TBL_PNM ) )

AND (A.RQST_NO, A.PDM_TBL_PNM, A.PDM_COL_PNM) IN ( SELECT #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},F.PDM_TBL_PNM, F.PDM_COL_PNM FROM ( SELECT Z.OBJ_ID,COL.PDM_TBL_PNM , COL.PDM_COL_PNM,COL.DATA_TYPE,COL.DATA_LEN,COL.DATA_SCAL,COL.COL_ORD FROM WAM_MST_TBL_MAP Z INNER JOIN WAQ_PDM_COL COL ON Z.MST_DDL_TBL_PNM = COL.PDM_TBL_PNM WHERE Z.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND Z.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231', '%Y%m%d') AND IFNULL(COL.PK_YN,'N') != 'Y' AND COL.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) E INNER JOIN ( SELECT Z.OBJ_ID,COL.PDM_TBL_PNM , COL.PDM_COL_PNM,COL.DATA_TYPE,COL.DATA_LEN,COL.DATA_SCAL,COL.COL_ORD FROM WAM_MST_TBL_MAP Z INNER JOIN WAQ_PDM_COL COL ON Z.HIST_DDL_TBL_PNM = COL.PDM_TBL_PNM WHERE Z.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND Z.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231', '%Y%m%d') AND IFNULL(COL.PK_YN,'N') != 'Y' AND COL.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) F ON E.OBJ_ID = F.OBJ_ID AND E.PDM_COL_PNM = F.PDM_COL_PNM WHERE (IFNULL(E.DATA_TYPE,'-') != IFNULL(F.DATA_TYPE,'-') OR IFNULL(E.DATA_LEN,0) != IFNULL(F.DATA_LEN,0) OR IFNULL(E.DATA_SCAL,0) != IFNULL(F.DATA_SCAL,0)) )

AND (A.RQST_NO, A.PDM_TBL_PNM, A.PDM_COL_PNM) IN ( SELECT #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},F.PDM_TBL_PNM, F.PDM_COL_PNM FROM ( SELECT Z.OBJ_ID,COL.PDM_TBL_PNM , COL.PDM_COL_PNM,COL.NONUL_YN FROM WAM_MST_TBL_MAP Z INNER JOIN WAQ_PDM_COL COL ON Z.MST_DDL_TBL_PNM = COL.PDM_TBL_PNM WHERE Z.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND Z.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231', '%Y%m%d') AND IFNULL(COL.PK_YN,'N') != 'Y' AND COL.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) E INNER JOIN ( SELECT Z.OBJ_ID,COL.PDM_TBL_PNM , COL.PDM_COL_PNM,COL.NONUL_YN FROM WAM_MST_TBL_MAP Z INNER JOIN WAQ_PDM_COL COL ON Z.HIST_DDL_TBL_PNM = COL.PDM_TBL_PNM WHERE Z.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND Z.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231', '%Y%m%d') AND IFNULL(COL.PK_YN,'N') != 'Y' AND COL.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) F ON E.OBJ_ID = F.OBJ_ID AND E.PDM_COL_PNM = F.PDM_COL_PNM WHERE IFNULL(E.NONUL_YN,'N') != IFNULL(F.NONUL_YN, 'N') )

AND (A.RQST_NO, A.PDM_TBL_PNM, A.PDM_COL_PNM) IN ( SELECT #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},F.PDM_TBL_PNM, F.PDM_COL_PNM FROM ( SELECT Z.OBJ_ID,COL.PDM_TBL_PNM , COL.PDM_COL_PNM,COL.DEFLT_VAL FROM WAM_MST_TBL_MAP Z INNER JOIN WAQ_PDM_COL COL ON Z.MST_DDL_TBL_PNM = COL.PDM_TBL_PNM WHERE Z.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND Z.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231', '%Y%m%d') AND IFNULL(COL.PK_YN,'N') != 'Y' AND COL.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) E INNER JOIN ( SELECT Z.OBJ_ID,COL.PDM_TBL_PNM , COL.PDM_COL_PNM,COL.DEFLT_VAL FROM WAM_MST_TBL_MAP Z INNER JOIN WAQ_PDM_COL COL ON Z.HIST_DDL_TBL_PNM = COL.PDM_TBL_PNM WHERE Z.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND Z.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231', '%Y%m%d') AND IFNULL(COL.PK_YN,'N') != 'Y' AND COL.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) F ON E.OBJ_ID = F.OBJ_ID AND E.PDM_COL_PNM = F.PDM_COL_PNM WHERE IFNULL(E.DEFLT_VAL ,'_') != IFNULL(F.DEFLT_VAL , '_') )
mapper.update: UPDATE /* WaqPdmColMapper.updateColOrd */ WAQ_PDM_COL C SET C.COL_ORD = ( SELECT AA.COL_ORD FROM ( SELECT A.RQST_NO , A.RQST_SNO , A.RQST_DTL_SNO , A.PDM_TBL_PNM, A.PDM_COL_PNM , RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY A.RQST_NO, A.RQST_SNO, A.PDM_TBL_PNM ORDER BY A.COL_ORD, A.PDM_COL_PNM) AS COL_ORD FROM WAQ_PDM_COL A WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND IFNULL(A.REG_TYP_CD,'X') !='D' ) AA WHERE 1 = 1 AND AA.RQST_NO = C.RQST_NO AND AA.RQST_SNO = C.RQST_SNO AND AA.RQST_DTL_SNO = C.RQST_DTL_SNO AND AA.PDM_TBL_PNM = C.PDM_TBL_PNM AND AA.PDM_COL_PNM = C.PDM_COL_PNM ) WHERE C.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND IFNULL(C.REG_TYP_CD, 'X') != 'D'
